net.pandoragames.far.ui.model

Interface FileRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileRepository

    public interface FileRepository
    A wrapper for a directory. Used together with a file chooser dialogue to add a check if the selected directory is accepted.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner at 22.03.2008

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getFile()
      Returns a file
      boolean setFile(java.io.File file)
      Sets a new file and returns true if the file was accepted.

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        java.io.File getFile()
        Returns a file
        Returns:
        non null file

      • setFile

        boolean setFile(java.io.File file)
        Sets a new file and returns true if the file was accepted. Null will be ignored, the method returning false.
        Parameters:
        file - file object
        Returns:
        true if the file was acccepted, false otherwise
